## ExtractMemoizerFields type

Extracts the additional properties or methods that a memoize function attaches to the function it memoizes (e.g., `clearCache`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExtractMemoizerFields<MemoizeFunction extends UnknownMemoizer> = Simplify<OmitIndexSignature<ReturnType<MemoizeFunction>>>;
```
**References:** [UnknownMemoizer](./reselect.unknownmemoizer.md)
